data.title: Sonnenallee Techno
data.meta_description: Throbbing deep kicks and bright metallic hats mix with hypnotic and mesmerizing synths, an ideal stage for dark and moody vocal samples. Sonnenallee Techno delivers intoxicating melodic motifs and infectious rhythmic loops, but you’ll also find one-shot…
data.text:
If you ever face any problems with our products, may it be installing and using them in your DAW, extraction or download errors, our support team will be here for you!

Just send us a message with your order details via our contact form and we will reply to you in 24-48 hours.

Our support team will fix any problem you might face and if it is impossible to solve your problem we will refund you every penny back.

We will answer any question you might have concerning our license, our shop or our products. Feel free to reach out to us!

Our products, services and website are always improving, so we are happy about everyone's feedback and suggestions.

If you are not 150% satisfied with our "Sonnenallee Techno" you can get your money back for up to 30 days!

We understand that trying something new can be scary. That's why we want to take the risk out of it for you. With our 30-day money-back guarantee, you can try our products with the peace of mind that you can get your money back if it's not the right fit for you.

We believe that our products can make a difference in your life, and we want to prove it to you. So take that leap of faith and give our products a try. You've got nothing to lose and everything to gain. We're confident that you won't be disappointed.

PS: 99% of our customers never used this guarantee!

Everyone who purchases a Ghosthack Audio product will receive a full legal license agreement as a PDF file.

This license agreement grants you full rights to create music tracks with our samples. You have the right to sell beats, publish your music with distributors like DistroKid and TuneCore and upload it on streaming platforms like Youtube, Spotify, Amazon Music, Apple Music etc.

Every sound and music track can be used for movies, videos, podcasts, cinema, video games and television.

All sounds are 100% royalty free which means you can use our samples without the need to share any royalties with us - All royalties belong to you. In other words, you can use the purchased audio content in your commercial projects without the need to make additional payments based on your project's success or reach.

Ghosthack Audio - Looking Out for Your Creative Projects Since 2016

Back in 2016, Ghosthack started as a free sample provider from Christoph's Dubstep music project and grew to become a small family business.

Ghosthack stands for unique and exclusive sounds that you can only get on our website. Christoph picks each sound designer carefully and works with them together to create well-rounded sound collections.

We are not a market place where anybody can upload anything. Each sample pack is curated by our team.

And each sound is checked multiple times by Alex. He works closely with our ever-growing team of sound designers to ensure the best quality you can get.

If you have questions or face any kind of problems with our website or products you can always contact Tatjana from our customer support. She will be happy to help you with your issues or - if they can't be solved - give you a full refund for your order.
